snippet.title: Slenderman [Game] Clips
snippet.description:
Just a few clips from a semi-experimental game I made last October in about 3 weeks. No spoilers included.

http://www.greenmeteorteam.com/slenderman.html

Give it a play if you like this kind of stuff :P

The AI of Slenderman is really close to what you'd expect for a weeping angel from Doctor Who.

The dark classical music is Quinn's Song by Kevin Mcleod based on Chopin's work.
http://www.incompetech.com/

To everyone who thinks they're hearing the Minecraft footsteps, they aren't exactly. Minecraft uses a couple foley grass sounds with random pitch/speed variation - so does this. But these sounds are from samples that are years older than Minecraft: http://www.freesound.org/search/?q=snoman
